problem_text:
(J. Wiegold). Let Γ be a finite simple group and let Nn(Γ) denote the set of normal subgroups of the free group Fn of rank n whose quotient is isomorphic to Γ. Conjecture: Aut(Fn) acts transitively on Nn(Γ) for n ⩾ 3.
This is not true for n = 2 (B. H. Neumann, H. Neumann, Math. Nachr., 4 (1951), 106–125).
A. Lubotzky
